title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 18 July 2014 - XWiki
content: has quit 00:19  has joined #xwiki 00:27  has quit 00:51  has quit 00:53  has quit 00:53  has quit 00:54  has joined #xwiki 00:54  has joined #xwiki 00:54  has joined #xwiki 00:55  has quit 00:55  has joined #xwiki 00:57  has quit 00:59  has joined #xwiki 01:18  has quit 01:19  has joined #xwiki 01:36  sdumitriu: you there? 01:36  Yes 01:36  Why aren't you sleeping? 01:37  :) 01:37  I'm looking at displayer\_email.vm and doc.display() 01:37  doc.display() is supposed to generate HTML 01:37  but displayer\_email.vm generates "mailto:value" when the mode is view 01:38  shouldn't it generate value instead? 01:39  Not sure... Does it always display HTML? 01:39  I think doc.display() is always supposed to generate HTML ATM 01:40  Actually yes 01:40  I think you're right 01:40   // If we're in new rendering engine we want to wrap the HTML returned by displayView() in 01:40   // a {{html/}} macro so that the user doesn't have to do it. 01:41  Just mailto:asd will fail to work unless it's displayed in a context that does interpret wiki markup 01:42  Then, if you do generate ") != -1)) { 01:42  since we don't have any < and > 01:42  and thus not {{html}} is added 01:42  s/not/no 01:42  Right 01:43  I'll try to see if it works 01:43  Gotta go 01:44  but I hope I won't break anything else…high risk... 01:44  k 01:44  Bye 01:44  sdumitriu: when you have some time another day 01:44  I'd like to talk to you to see how things are going 01:44  bfn 02:25  has joined #xwiki 02:38  has joined #xwiki 02:58  has joined #xwiki 03:00  has quit 03:11  has quit 03:13  has quit 03:13  has joined #xwiki 03:13  has joined #xwiki 03:15  has quit 03:15  has quit 03:15  has joined #xwiki 03:16  has quit 03:20  has joined #xwiki 03:21  has quit 05:21  has quit 05:21  has joined #xwiki 06:46  has joined #xwiki 06:49  has quit 06:59  has joined #xwiki 07:06  has joined #xwiki 07:11  has joined #xwiki 07:14  has quit 07:36  has joined #xwiki 08:31  has joined #xwiki 08:32  has quit 08:35  has joined #xwiki 08:50  has joined #xwiki 08:52  has joined #xwiki 08:53  has joined #xwiki 08:54  has joined #xwiki 09:03  has joined #xwiki 09:17  has joined #xwiki 09:50  has joined #xwiki 09:56  has joined #xwiki 10:32  has joined #xwiki 11:38  has quit 11:59  has joined #xwiki 12:34  has quit 12:37  has quit 13:04  has joined #xwiki 14:01  has joined #xwiki 14:04  has quit 14:05  has joined #xwiki 15:04  has quit 16:13  has quit 16:59  has quit 17:01  has joined #xwiki 17:24  has joined #xwiki 17:47  hi 17:48  please, What's the diff btw and ? 17:52  has quit 17:55  Lyes1: technically it means the same thing 17:55  version="1.1" just indicate that it has been generated by 1.1 implementation 17:56  (wikistream based implementation) 17:56  in which everything in the document is ordered to optimize streamed parsing 17:57  but it's just ordering 17:59  whether or not you have this attribute it's supported by all XAR parser implementations 18:00  Thanks 18:26  has quit 18:32  has quit 18:46  has left #xwiki 18:49  has quit 18:53  has joined #xwiki 18:54  has quit 18:58  has quit 18:59  has quit 19:24  has quit 19:31  has quit 19:34  has joined #xwiki 19:35  has quit 19:45  has quit 19:45  has joined #xwiki 20:07  has joined #xwiki 20:09  has quit 20:11  has quit 20:35  has quit 20:36  has joined #xwiki 20:38  has joined #xwiki 20:57  has quit 21:06  has quit 21:16  has joined #xwiki 21:20  has joined #xwiki 21:21  has joined #xwiki 21:34  has quit 21:38  has quit 21:56  has joined #xwiki 22:11  has joined #xwiki 22:18  has quit 22:26  has joined #xwiki 22:33  has joined #xwiki 22:41  has joined #xwiki 22:45  has quit 22:47  has quit
